name: Heid: The game
description:
This is a simple 2d-platformer game made for Heid, an spanish pagan-metal band; the game has one full level with final boss, with a shop in the tavern where you can buy some songs from their cd with the ingame coins.

Jus take a try and comment your opinion os suggestions in the comments, cause we may had more levels in the future.

(recomended to play in full screen)
